title: Covid-69: Taking the Effects on the Side
description: They were working hard to develop the vaccine that would save the world. But things don’t always go as planned.Drs. Pamela Johnson and Roberto da Silva are leading an elite team of scientists developing the coronavirus vaccine. The stakes couldn’t be higher, so he decides to take a shortcut and try it out on himself. A silly accident results in him actually being injected with bonobonate, a powerful testosterone booster isolated from bonobos, primates who mate up to 50 times a day. He turns from a shy lab scientist into a sexy beast, and who will be his prey? None other than his colleague Pamela, who suspects nothing. Will our heroes finish their work in time to save the world from the lethal pandemic, or will they get lost in the whirlpool of passion and intoxicating lust?COVID-69: taking the effects on the side is a hilarious erotic novel that will make you laugh out loud and moan out louder.
author: Jessica T. Lawson
